data.name: Catch a Lover - Nightmare
data.detailed_description:
In the new DLC, you and your friends will have to compete in a deadly battle. The lover's nightmare became a reality, terrible monsters want revenge on Lover and Wife for their sins!

In this addon:
- Two new characters - a demon and his faithful dog-servant
- Various types of weapons that will help you in the fight against monsters
- Atmospheric and mystical location
- New rules of the game, now you have only one goal - to survive at any cost
- Lots of new items and game mechanics
- Additional animations
- New search menu, which should make the selection of players more convenient
- Improved graphics

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 Bit/ Windows 8 64 Bit/ Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 (1GB) or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i5/i7 3.3 GHz or AMD equivalent
